control.description: Trigger to Auto run the Latest media python after a 1 min delay if scan on startup is enabled
Don't run anything is scan on startup is Disabled and jump to the startup playlist
Trigger to Auto run the Latest media python after a 1 min delay if scan on startup is enabled
